text:
The Southern Railway has announced the following special trains:

The Chennai Egmore – Tirunelveli ‘Suvidha’ special train (00635) will leave Chennai Egmore at 9 p.m. on January 22 and reach Tirunelveli at 10.45 a.m. the next day.

The Tirunelveli – Chennai Egmore ‘Suvidha’ special train (00636) will leave Tirunelveli at 2.45 p.m. on January 24 and reach Chennai Egmore at 4.20 a.m. the next day.

The trains will stop at Tambaram, Chengalpattu, Villupuram, Vriddhachalam, Tiruchi, Dindigul, Kodaikkanal Road, Madurai, Virudhunagar, Sattur, Kovilpatti and Vanchi Maniyachchi.
title: Special trains between Chennai and Tirunelveli
